line.originaltext: 1 cup all-purpose flour
2 cups Italian-style seasoned bread crumbs
1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper
2 eggs, beaten
2 tablespoons water
24 chicken tenderloins
2 quarts oil for frying
1 cup mayonnaise
3 tablespoons prepared horseradish
1/2 cup sour cream
1 dash Worcestershire sauce
3 tablespoons prepared mustard
Place flour in a shallow bowl.
Place flour in a shallow bowl.
Place breadcrumbs in a separate shallow bowl, and mix with ground black pepper and cayenne pepper.
Place breadcrumbs in a separate shallow bowl, and mix with ground black pepper and cayenne pepper.
Place breadcrumbs in a separate shallow bowl, and mix with ground black pepper and cayenne pepper.
Place eggs and water in a small bowl.
Place eggs and water in a small bowl.
Place eggs and water in a small bowl.
One piece at a time, coat the chicken in the flour, the eggs and the bread crumbs, and set aside.
One piece at a time, coat the chicken in the flour, the eggs and the bread crumbs, and set aside.
One piece at a time, coat the chicken in the flour, the eggs and the bread crumbs, and set aside.
Heat oil in a deep fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Heat oil in a deep fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Heat oil in a deep fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
In small batches, fry chicken 6 to 8 minutes, or until golden brown.
line.annotation: cook(ing19, t8, ing27, "fried chicken strips", "fry 6 or 8 at a time")

line.originaltext: In a separate small bowl, combine the mayonnaise, horseradish, sour cream, Worcestershire sauce and mustard.
line.annotation: combine({ing21, ing22, ing23, ing24, ing25}, ing28, "dipping sauce", "mix")
